title: The Angel Who Pawned Her Harp

sources.title: The Angel Who Pawned Her Harp (1954) Diane Cilento, Felix Aylmer, Robert Eddison | Movie, Subtitles
sources.description:
An angel finds that she needs money to fulfill her mission on Earth. Her only solution to this problem is to pawn her harp.

Original title: The Angel who pawned her harp (1954)

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/rQtxCo66FRM

Director: Alan Bromly
Writers: Charles Terrot, Sidney Cole
Stars: Felix Aylmer, Diane Cilento, Robert Eddison
Genres: Comedy, Fantasy

This video is available with subtitles in more than 30 languages. Click on ⚙️ and choose your preferred language.

00:01:17 Down to earth 
00:15:01 Going to the dance
00:18:44 End of the evening kiss
00:27:27 At the greyhound races
00:31:21 Attempted mugging
